parent.description: The parent metrics view from which this metrics view is derived. If specified, this will inherit properties from the parent.

title.description: The display name for the dashboard.

model.description: The model name powering the dashboard; used for Rill models. Required if 'table' is not provided.

table.description: The table name powering the dashboard; used instead of 'model' for dashboards created directly from sources or external OLAP tables.

timeseries.description: The timestamp column from your model for x-axis data in line charts. Optional; if not specified, line charts will not appear.

default_time_range.description: The default time range shown when a user initially loads the dashboard. Defaults to the full time range of the timeseries column if not specified.

smallest_time_grain.description: The smallest time granularity allowed for viewing in the dashboard.

available_time_zones.description: Time zones to be pinned at the top of the time zone selector, making the dashboard time zone aware.

first_day_of_week.description: The first day of the week for time grain aggregation. 1 for Monday through 7 for Sunday.

first_month_of_year.description: The first month of the year for time grain aggregation. 1 for January through 12 for December.

default_theme.description: The default theme to apply to the dashboard. A valid theme must be defined in the project.

name.description: A stable identifier for the dimension.

label.description: A label for the dashboard dimension.

column.description: A categorical column for the dimension.

property.description: A property reference for the dimension.

expression.description: A non-aggregate expression for the dimension. Required if 'column' is not provided.

description.description: A freeform text description of the dimension.

ignore.description: If true, hides the dimension from the dashboard.

unnest.description: Allows multi-valued dimensions to be unnested, switching filters to 'contains' instead of exact match.

dimensions.description: Definitions of dimensions for exploring segments and filtering the dashboard.

name.description: A stable identifier for the measure.

label.description: A label for the dashboard measure.

expression.description: An expression combining operators and functions for aggregations.

description.description: A freeform text description of the measure.

format_preset.description: Controls the formatting of this measure in the dashboard.

format_d3.description: Controls the formatting of this measure using a d3-format string.

format_d3_locale.description: Defines a custom locale for d3-format.

grouping.description: The array of group sizes (e.g., [3]), cycled as needed.

numerals.description: Optional array of ten strings to replace the numerals 0-9.

percent.description: Optional symbol to replace the percent suffix.

ignore.description: If true, hides the measure from the dashboard.

valid_percent_of_total.description: Indicates whether percent-of-total values should be rendered for this measure.

measures.description: Numeric aggregates of columns from your data model.

parent_dimensions.description: Dimensions to include from parent metrics view. It supports "*", a list of names or advanced matching using regex(key - regex), DuckDB expression(key - expr), or exclusion(key - exclude). if not specified, this will inherit all dimensions from the parent metrics view.

oneOf.description: Wildcard '*' selector that includes all available fields in the selection.
Explicit list of fields to include in the selection.

regex.description: Select dimensions using a regular expression.

expr.description: DuckDB SQL expression to select fields based on custom logic.

exclude.description: Select all dimensions except those listed here.

parent_measures.description: Measures to include from parent metrics view. It supports  "*", a list of names or advanced matching using regex(key - regex), DuckDB expression(key - expr), or exclusion(key - exclude). if not specified, this will inherit all measures from the parent metrics view.

oneOf.description: Wildcard '*' selector that includes all available fields in the selection.
Explicit list of fields to include in the selection.

regex.description: Select measures using a regular expression.

expr.description: DuckDB SQL expression to select fields based on custom logic.

exclude.description: Select all measures except those listed here.

explore.description: Defines an inline explore view for the metrics view.

skip.description: If true, disables the explore view for this metrics view.

display_name.description: Display name for the explore view.

banner.description: Custom banner displayed at the header of the explore view.

dimensions.description: Dimensions to include from the metrics view. It supports "*", a list of names or advanced matching using regex(key - regex), DuckDB expression(key - expr), or exclusion(key - exclude). if not specified, this will include all dimensions from the metrics view.

oneOf.description: Wildcard '*' selector that includes all available fields in the selection.
Explicit list of fields to include in the selection.

regex.description: Select dimensions using a regular expression.

expr.description: DuckDB SQL expression to select fields based on custom logic.

exclude.description: Select all dimensions except those listed here.

measures.description: Measures to include from the metrics view. It supports  "*", a list of names or advanced matching using regex(key - regex), DuckDB expression(key - expr), or exclusion(key - exclude). if not specified, this will include all measures from the parent metrics view.

oneOf.description: Wildcard '*' selector that includes all available fields in the selection.
Explicit list of fields to include in the selection.

regex.description: Select measures using a regular expression.

expr.description: DuckDB SQL expression to select fields based on custom logic.

exclude.description: Select all measures except those listed here.

oneOf.description: Name of an existing theme to apply to the explore view.

primary.description: Overrides the primary blue color in the dashboard.

secondary.description: Overrides the secondary color in the dashboard.

colors.description: Used to override the dashboard colors. Either primary or secondary color must be provided.

theme.description: Name of the theme to use. Only one of theme and embedded_theme can be set.

time_ranges.description: Overrides the list of default time range selections available in the dropdown. It can be string or an object with a 'range' and optional 'comparison_offsets'.

oneOf.description: A valid ISO 8601 duration or Rill extension for the selection.

range.description: A valid ISO 8601 duration or Rill extension for the selection.

comparison_offsets.description: List of time comparison options for this time range selection.

offset.description: Time offset for comparison (e.g., 'P1D' for one day ago)

range.description: Custom time range for comparison period

time_zones.description: List of time zones to pin to the top of the time zone selector. Should be a list of IANA time zone identifiers.

lock_time_zone.description: When true, the explore view will be locked to the first time zone provided in the time_zones list. If no time_zones are provided, it will be locked to UTC.

allow_custom_time_range.description: Defaults to true. When set to false, hides the ability to set a custom time range for the user.

defaults.description: Preset UI state to show by default.

oneOf.description: Wildcard '*' selector that includes all available fields in the selection.
Explicit list of fields to include in the selection.

regex.description: Select dimensions using a regular expression.

expr.description: DuckDB SQL expression to select fields based on custom logic.

exclude.description: Select all dimensions except those listed here.

oneOf.description: Wildcard '*' selector that includes all available fields in the selection.
Explicit list of fields to include in the selection.

regex.description: Select measures using a regular expression.

expr.description: DuckDB SQL expression to select fields based on custom logic.

exclude.description: Select all measures except those listed here.

time_range.description: Default time range to display when the explore view loads.

comparison_mode.description: Default comparison mode for metrics (none, time, or dimension).

comparison_dimension.description: Default dimension to use for comparison when comparison_mode is 'dimension'.

embeds.description: Configuration options for embedded explore views.

hide_pivot.description: When true, hides the pivot table view in embedded mode.
